thread.title: Fat Joe talks defense before Celeb Game
thread.title_full: Fat Joe talks defense before Celeb Game

author: USA TODAY
title: Fat Joe talks defense before Celeb Game
text:
Fat Joe talks defense before Celeb Game Will there be defense in the celebrity game?! Post to Facebook Fat Joe talks defense before Celeb Game Will there be defense in the celebrity game?!  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/fat-joe-nba-all-star-celebrity-game-defense-serious-pep-talk-pregame-locker-room/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Fat Joe talks defense before Celeb Game Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 7:27 p.m. ET Feb. 17, 2017 
Fat Joe is serious. (Photo: NBA) 
Will there be serious defense in the NBA All-Star Celebrity Game this year? If Jemele Hill's team listens to assistant coach Fat Joe, maybe. 
Rapper Fat Joe told the team in the locker room: 
"We gotta play D even though it's a celebrity basketball game. I'm being serious. If ya'll wanna win, then you gotta play serious. Once you up 20, 30 points, you can act stupid and do whatever you want to do â€¦ We gotta contest every shot, we gotta rebound, we gotta get everybody in the game." 
As Fat Joe says this the team shouts that they want to see a blowout and that they agree! It seems like the team is with him. Inside the #NBACelebGame lockerroom for Assistant Coach @fatjoe hype up speech pic.twitter.com/gvjmlNhhAy
